articles.title: Has Coronavirus Really Mutated into Two Strains, with One More Transmissible Than The Other? - Newsweek
articles.description: A paper stating a mutation to the coronavirus which causes COVID-19 is of "urgent concern" went viral this week, but experts told Newsweek that's not as worrying as it sounds.
